# Overview {.unnumbered}

This dashboard presents key performance indicators (KPIs) for the `{python} team` Community Mental Health Team (CMHT). The data is organized into three main categories:

1. [Staffing KPIs](staffing.qmd)
2. [Referral and Access KPIs](referral-access.qmd)
3. [Safety KPIs](safety.qmd)

Click on the links above or use the navigation menu to explore each category of KPIs.

For detailed definitions of all KPIs, please refer to the [KPI Definitions](kpi-definitions.qmd) page.
